page.title: 18Haywood Flower and Veg. Show
page.content: The Flower and Vegetable Show has become an annual event. For many years there was a Village Carnival, but this eventually ceased. Ladies from the W.I. decided that an event similar to the Carnival, that could bring all the villages together, was needed. The Haywood Flower and Vegetable Society was formed, and a committee established to organise a show. The Countess of Lichfield became the President, and presented the first cup. Since the first show many other people have donated prizes. All local organisations are invited to become involved. The society, which has grown in popularity, is now in its sixth year, and has been extended to organise The Rose and Sweet Pea Show, which may well become another annual event.
